text: Ke yiniharule bhandachanh (ki paigambarale) allahabare mit'thyaropana gareko cha?’’ Yadi allahale cahancha bhane (he muham'mada) tapa'iko hrdayama chapa laga'idincha. Ra allahale aphno vanibata asatyala'i mita'irakheko cha, ra aphno kurabata satyala'i pramanita garekocha. Nihsandeha usale chatibhitrako kuraharu pani jandacha
